import { finalId } from '../ProductList/ProductListContainer' import style from './ProductPage.module.css' const ProductPage = (props) => { const index = props.nft.findIndex(el => el.id == finalId) return (

Card #{props.nft[index].id}

NFT: {props.nft[index].name}

Amount: {props.nft[index].amount} pcs

Price: {props.nft[index].price}$

Size:

Width: {props.nft[index].size.width}mm

Height: {props.nft[index].size.height}mm

{props.nft[index].comments.map(c =>

from: Anonymous

Comment: {props.nft[index].comments[0].description }

date: {props.nft[index].comments[0].date }

{props.nft[index].comments.length > 1 ?
: null}
)}

from: Anonymous

Comment: {props.nft[index].comments[0].description }

date: {props.nft[index].comments[0].date }

: null } */}

}
) } export default ProductPage;
